front.extra:
Writ petition filed under Article 226 of the Constitution of
India for issuance of Writ of Certiorarified Mandamus to call for entire
records relating to G.O.Rt.No.889 dated 20.09.2013 on the file of the
first respondent, quash the same and consequently direct the third
respondent to conduct enquiry afresh as contemplated under the
provisions of Tamil Nadu Societies Registration Act, 1975 by affording
opportunity to the petitioner and all interested persons in the enquiry
in accordance with law.

Government Advocate for R1 to R5
Mr.G.Sugumaran for R6
